text: Measuring the ground clearance (gc) of our car, we have seen that without driver the gc=34mm, with the endurance driver gc=31mm and with the skid pad driver gc=28mm. Which of the following sentences is correct?

answer_options.answer_text: We will have no ground clearance penalization, because the minimum ground clearance is 20mm
We will be penalized with Disqualified (DQ) only for that particular runs where ground clearance is violated
The team will be penalized in all the dynamic events, because the minimum gc=30mm with driver
We will not be penalized, because the minimum gc=30mm without driver

answers.answer_text: We will have no ground clearance penalization, because the minimum ground clearance is 20mm
We will be penalized with Disqualified (DQ) only for that particular runs where ground clearance is violated
The team will be penalized in all the dynamic events, because the minimum gc=30mm with driver
We will not be penalized, because the minimum gc=30mm without driver
